fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Check if someone is a minion. If they are, attack them
-Save the day!

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If this role spawns, reroll someone else into Antagonist (3747)
-a Minion is defined as someone without a town goal, with the exception of Neutral Benign roles
-Saving the Day wins the game for all non-minions, but it cannot be used until Antagonist is defeated
-Everyone knows you’re the Protagonist.
-All Non-minion players will gain a one time use ability called “Form a Mob” which will reveal 3 Minion player’s roles and kill one other Minion player. This can only be used if every single good player uses it at the same time
-Cannot die by any means other than the Antagonist’s doomsday beam
